metadata.title: 5508-1 -- Python LDAP vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Python LDAP incorrectly handled certain regular expressions. An remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo ua fix USN-5508-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python3-pyldap - 3.2.0-4ubuntu5.1 python3-ldap - 3.2.0-4ubuntu5.1 No subscription required
